UG PG
Physics
PH201: Electrodynamics
Prof. Kavita Devi
2 Lectures
1 Tutorials
0 Practicals
6 Credits
This is a core course for Engineering Physics Program. It deals with many aspects of electromagnetic properties, behavior of electromagnetic wave in space and materials. The formalism developed here could help in better understanding of several technologies, like, communication, antennas, GPS, etc.
